summary: Completed comprehensive frontend testing of SMAN 2 Pangkalan Bun school website. All pages, navigation, language switcher, and features working perfectly. Website built with Astro + React + Vite framework with excellent multi-language support (Indonesian/English).
passed_tests: Homepage loads with hero, stats, about, and news sections
Navigation menu with working dropdowns for Profile, News, Finance, Services
Profile page with vision/mission, facilities, and history sections
News page with articles and agenda sidebar
Achievements page with stats and categorized achievements
Finance page with BOS, APBD, and Committee sections
Services page with service grid and previews
Alumni page with stats and featured alumni
Contact page with form, map, and contact info
Footer with quick links and social media icons
All data-testid attributes present for testing
